text: Steven De Petter (born 22 November 1985) is a Belgian football player currently playing for Sint-Truidense V.V.. He was born in Aalst, Belgium. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Aalst, Belgium Category:Belgian footballers Category:F.C.V. title: Steven De Petter
